description: You find $500 on the street. - Receive $500.
You find $1000 on the street. - Receive $1000.
You find $1500 on the street. - Receive $1500.
You find $2000 on the street. - Receive $2000.
You find $500 on the street. - Receive $500.
You find $1000 on the street. - Receive $1000.
You find $1500 on the street. - Receive $1500.
You find $2000 on the street. - Receive $2000.

you encounter a junkie who is completely out of it! You rob him and take his money. 

- Receive $600.

you encounter a junkie who is completely out of it! You rob him and take his money. 

- Receive $300.

you encounter a junkie who is completely out of it! You rob him and take his money. 

- Receive $500.

You encounter a junkie who is completely out of it! You rob him and take his money. 

- You receive nothing; he was completely broke!

You run into the police who detain you. 

- Pay a fine of 500$.

You run into the police who detain you. 

- Pay a fine of 500$.

You run into the police who detain you. 

- Pay a fine of 800$.

You run into the police who detain you. 

- Pay a fine of 800$.

One of your fellow drug dealers needs your assistance to secure their release from jail. 

- Pay their bail-out $500.

Oh no!!! The police have caught your supplier! Now you're worried about being exposed. 

- Pay $700 to keep him quiet.

Feeling lucky, you decide to visit the casino and wager an amount of your choice on either Odd or Even. 

- Choose one and bet any amount you like.

You're furious and feel like smashing one of your rivals!

- Choose a rival, move to their piece, and Fight!!!"

You've obtained intel on your rivals and pitted them against each other in a street brawl!

- Choose two of your rivals to face off against each other in a street fight!

Feeling lucky, you decide to visit the casino and wager an amount of your choice on either Odd or Even. 

- Choose one and bet any amount you like.

Feeling lucky, you decide to visit the casino and wager an amount of your choice on either Odd or Even. 

- Choose one and bet any amount you like.

You're furious and feel like smashing one of your rivals!

- Choose a rival, move to their piece, and Fight!!!"

With rival intel in hand, you've orchestrated a street brawl between them!"!

- Choose two of your rivals to face off against each other in a street fight!
FUCK!!! Your supplier got caught... - Sell out of the drug you have the least units of!

Feeling lucky, you decide to visit the casino and wager an amount of your choice on either Odd or Even. 

- Choose one and bet any amount you like.

You've received information about your rivals and set them against each other in a street brawl!

- Choose two of your rivals to face off against each other in a street fight!

You got caught, one of your rival has rat you out to the police. 

- Your stash of drugs takes a hit.

You've been busted!! one of your rivals has snitched to the police.

- You suffer a loss in your drug inventory.

You got caught, one of your rival has rat you out to the police. 

- A portion of your drugs is gone.

Police Trouble Ahead! Law enforcement is on to you due to suspicious activities.

- Pay a $1000 bribe to evade consequences.

If you're unable to afford the bribe The police will take half of your units.

Police Investigation Alert! The authorities have their eyes on you, suspecting illegal activities!

Pay $1000 bribe to evade consequences.

If you can't afford the bribe the police will confiscate 50% of your units.

You find yourself in a sticky situation as the police close in. You have a choice!

- Pay a bribe of $1000 to avoid any consequences.

If you can't afford the bribe the police will confiscate half of your drugs.

Secret intelligence triggers a Police Raid! 

- Offer a payoff of $1000!

Failure to pay will lead the police to take 50% of your units.

Police have caught wind of your activities and are closing in.

- Pay a hush money $1000 to avoid problems.

If you can't afford the fine, the police will confiscate half of your drugs.

Confidential intelligence triggers a Police Raid! You have a chance to bribe the authorities.

- Settle for a bribe of $1000!

If your funds fall short, the police will seize 50% of your stash.

Secret information leads to a Police Raid! You now have the opportunity to bribe the police.

- Pay hush money of $1000!

If you don't have enough funds available, the police will confiscate half of your drugs.

As neighborhood activity buzzes, you seize the opportunity to take charge. Returning home, you discover a significant portion of your drugs missing

— evidence of a pickpocket's mischief!

When you land on the sofa after a long day, you can feel that your pockets aren't as full as when you left... Damn!

- You've lost some of your drugs!

At an underground nightclub event with high demand, you're in luck with an extra stash in your jacket... but it's vanished! It's been swiped!

- You're left with fewer drugs.

You celebrate a successful week with your dealers at a bar, but a group of troublemakers arrives, and you're too drunk to defend yourself. 

- They beat you up and steal some of your drugs.

As the week ends triumphantly, you throw a lavish party. Unexpected guests arrive, sparking chaos at its peak.

- They manage to steal some of your drugs.

You get a tip about a hidden drug stash in an abandoned warehouse. Excited, you go, but trigger an alarm while searching. Police show up!

- You have to flee, losing some of your drugs in the process.

During a deal with a new contact, suspicion arises as they offer you a drink. Dizziness hits, and you realize you've been drugged.

- You wake up later to find some drugs missing.

Urgent call from a dealer in trouble. You arrive to rival standoff. Talks fail, fight erupts.

- Amid chaos, drugs destroyed and you barely manage to escape with your life.

You see a shady type walking by, later you suddenly realise something is missing from your inventory.

- Your drug cache is reduced.
